statements: SELECT * FROM refugees;
SELECT name, country_of_origin, refugee_status FROM refugees WHERE support_needed = TRUE;
SELECT id, name, country_of_origin FROM refugees WHERE country_of_origin = 'Syria';
SELECT * FROM refugees WHERE refugee_status = 'Asylum Granted' ORDER BY country_of_origin DESC;
SELECT id, name, support_needed FROM refugees WHERE resettlement_status = 'Pending' LIMIT 3;
SELECT name, country_of_origin FROM refugees WHERE support_needed = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM refugees WHERE country_of_origin = 'Syria' ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, refugee_status FROM refugees WHERE country_of_origin = 'Iraq' AND resettlement_status = 'Pending';
SELECT name, country_of_origin, refugee_status FROM refugees WHERE refugee_status = 'Granted' AND support_needed = TRUE;
SELECT id, name, resettlement_status FROM refugees WHERE country_of_origin = 'Yemen' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM refugees_rights WHERE id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM refugees_rights WHERE country_of_origin = 'Syria';
SELECT * FROM resettlement_efforts WHERE support_received = TRUE;
SELECT id, last_name, refugee_status FROM refugees_rights ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM resettlement_efforts WHERE resettlement_location = 'Canada' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, country_of_origin FROM refugees_rights WHERE refugee_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM resettlement_efforts WHERE support_received = TRUE;
SELECT id, first_name, last_name, country_of_origin FROM refugees_rights WHERE country_of_origin = 'Syria';
SELECT resettlement_location, support_received FROM resettlement_efforts WHERE resettlement_location LIKE '%Canada%';
SELECT id, first_name, last_name, country_of_origin, resettlement_location FROM refugees_rights JOIN resettlement_efforts ON refugees_rights.id = resettlement_efforts.refugee_id;
SELECT * FROM refugees_rights;
SELECT first_name, last_name, country_of_origin FROM refugees_rights WHERE status='approved';
SELECT id, organization_name, location FROM resettlement_efforts WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT program_name, start_date, end_date FROM resettlement_efforts WHERE location='Canada';
SELECT service_name, description, contact_person FROM support_services WHERE contact_number='1234567890';
SELECT * FROM refugees_rights WHERE country_of_origin = 'Syria';
SELECT first_name, last_name, status FROM refugees_rights WHERE status = 'Asylum Granted' ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM resettlement_efforts WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01' AND end_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY program_name DESC;
SELECT service_name, description, contact_person FROM support_services WHERE contact_number LIKE '%123%' LIMIT 3;
SELECT first_name, last_name, country_of_origin FROM refugees_rights WHERE country_of_origin IN ('Syria', 'Iraq') ORDER BY country_of_origin, last_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM refugees;
SELECT name, country_of_origin, age FROM refugees WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT id, name, arrival_date FROM refugees ORDER BY arrival_date DESC;
SELECT id, name, location, contact_person FROM resettlement_agencies WHERE location='City A';
SELECT * FROM support_activities WHERE date='2022-08-10';
SELECT * FROM refugees WHERE age > 20 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, country_of_origin, gender FROM refugees WHERE gender = 'female';
SELECT name, location, type FROM services_providers WHERE location LIKE '%City%';
SELECT activity_name, date, time FROM support_activities WHERE date >= '2022-01-01' AND date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM resettlement_agencies ORDER BY location ASC, name DESC;
SELECT * FROM rights ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT name, country FROM resettlement WHERE approval_status = 'Approved'
SELECT coordinator, organization FROM coordination WHERE location = 'City Center'
SELECT description, amount FROM support WHERE type = 'Financial' ORDER BY amount DESC
SELECT document_type, document_name, date_uploaded FROM documents ORDER BY date_uploaded
SELECT * FROM rights WHERE country = 'Canada' ORDER BY deadline DESC;
SELECT id, name, status FROM rights WHERE status = 'Active' AND deadline > '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, name, country FROM resettlement WHERE approval_status = 'Approved' ORDER BY date_applied ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT coordinator, organization FROM coordination WHERE location = 'Europe' AND coordinator LIKE '%John%';
SELECT type, amount, contact FROM support WHERE amount > 10000 ORDER BY amount DESC, type ASC;
